title: Sion is so broken
body:
http://prntscr.com/6dpt9t

Look he builds FULL tank sion and still does the most damage in the game to champions. How is that even fair?

replies.body: This graph proves his full tank Sion.
Increase his mana cost for his cooldowns that way he wont be spamming his E,Q throughout the entire game

Just needs base damage lowered is all, when a champion builds full tank and is able to do a lot of damage that's because of the base stats, Riot will nerf his base stats soon just wait for next patch or the patch after, it'll happen.

Maybe but in my own opinion it would be unnecessary. He can be quite disruptive in teamfights but he's susceptible to high mobility champions and kiting. His Q is not impossible to dodge, his E is totally dodgeable, don't stick near him and get health chunked by his W, his ult is definitely dodgeable.
Sion does not need a nerf. If anything he needs a flat MS boost  and CC immunity while in zombie mode.
They need to nerf his E's base damage. Sion doesn't fit the "poke them down" theme. Shift that power to his Q or his 50-50 passive.

It makes sense, all of his abilities are AoE and if it hits more than one champion it will add the damage onto his total damage. So lets say Sion's Q does 300 damage at full charge. If he hits all 5 enemy champions with his Q that's 1.5k damage to champions. Then theres his passive, which deals A TON of damage if you let him punch you. Most of the other champs in that game are single target damage on at least 3 spells. But, as JasonWazza says there isn't any proof hes full tank.

~ Edit: I just had a look into your match history. First of all, you are level 7. Unless this is a smurf, don't go pointing the OP finger at champions when you clearly haven't played this game for very long. Second of all, he had a Thornmails and Sunfire, both of which damage quite a lot if stood next to or focused. That's how he did the most damage to champions. Since this is a pre level 10 game I would assume people didn't consider these things, and just stood right next to Sion, autoattacking him or something.

Also as another point, if his leveling faster then everyone else, his damage looks higher regardless.

Tank doesn't mean doesn't do damage.
